core

Class HidatoSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.HidatoSolver

  • public class HidatoSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is created for solving a Hidato puzzle with using JaCoP library. Initially define the puzzle map with given numbers Later regroup the puzzle cell (3x3) and search for the solution.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hüsnü ISLEYEN

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<org.jacop.core.IntVar> ourTable
      This arraylist helps us, when constraints are imposed. and GUI interface easily reach solution
      static org.jacop.core.Store store
      All variables and constraints are stored in a Store object

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void group3x3(int indeX, int indeY)
      This method create a group 3x3(neighbours of given value) and impose Among constraints to it.
      void group3x3Or(int indeX, int indeY)
      This method create a group and impose primitive constraints for unknown box.

      Model method creates a puzzle map in IntVar format and imposes defined constraints.

      Search method will search to domains for correct solution.

    • Method Detail

      • model

        public void model()
        Model method creates a puzzle map in IntVar format and imposes defined constraints.

      • search

        public void search()
        Search method will search to domains for correct solution. If it finds a solution, it will display.

      • group3x3

        public void group3x3(int indeX,
                     int indeY)
        This method create a group 3x3(neighbours of given value) and impose Among constraints to it. This method is used for only known box. It takes a box and regroup its neighbour and impose constarints that sequential numbers will take place in this group. (value - centeral box,value + 1, and value - 1) these three values are contained by group.
        Parameters:
        indeX - x coordinate of given cell
        indeY - y coordinate of given cell

      • group3x3Or

        public void group3x3Or(int indeX,
                       int indeY)
        This method create a group and impose primitive constraints for unknown box. This method is used for known and unknown box. It takes a box and regroup its neighbour and impose constarints that sequential numbers will take place in this group. (value - centeral box,value + 1, and value - 1) these three values are contained by group.
        Parameters:
        indeX - x coordinate of centeral cell
        indeY - y coordinate of centeral cell
